original_text: Joshua said to the men from the tribes of Ephraim and Manasseh, ‘You have very many strong men who can fight. I will give you more land than the part that you have already received.
korean_text: 여호수아가 다시 요셉의 족속 곧 에브라임과 므낫세에게 말하여 이르되 너는 큰 민족이요 큰 권능이 있은즉 한 분깃만 가질 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: from the tribes of Ephraim and Manasseh
You have very many strong men
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게는 매우 많은 강한 용사들이 있다

sentences.original_text: I will give you more land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 더 많은 땅을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: than the part that you have already received
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이미 받은 부분보다 더 많은
